segment.source: How to Deploy DaRT 7.0
segment.target: How to Deploy DaRT 7.0

segment.source: How to Deploy DaRT 7.0
segment.target: How to Deploy DaRT 7.0

segment.source: How to Deploy DaRT 7.0
segment.target: How to Deploy DaRT 7.0

segment.source: This topic provides instructions to deploy Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7 in your environment.
segment.target: This topic provides instructions to deploy Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7 in your environment.

segment.source: The first procedure in this topic assumes that you are installing all functionality on one administrator computer.
segment.target: The first procedure in this topic assumes that you are installing all functionality on one administrator computer.

segment.source: When you need to deploy or uninstall DaRT on multiple computers, using an electronic software distribution system for example, it might be easier to use command line installation options.
segment.target: When you need to deploy or uninstall DaRT on multiple computers, using an electronic software distribution system for example, it might be easier to use command line installation options.

segment.source: Those options are defined in the second procedure in this topic which provides example usage for the available command line options.
segment.target: Those options are defined in the second procedure in this topic which provides example usage for the available command line options.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Before you install DaRT, ensure that the computer meets the minimum system requirements listed in DaRT 7.0 Supported Configurations.
segment.target: Before you install DaRT, ensure that the computer meets the minimum system requirements listed in DaRT 7.0 Supported Configurations.

segment.source: To install DaRT on an administrator computer
segment.target: To install DaRT on an administrator computer

segment.source: Locate the DaRT installation files that you received as part of your software download.
segment.target: Locate the DaRT installation files that you received as part of your software download.

segment.source: Double-click the DaRT installation file that corresponds to your system requirements, either 32-bit or 64-bit.
segment.target: Double-click the DaRT installation file that corresponds to your system requirements, either 32-bit or 64-bit.

segment.source: The DaRT installation file is named MSDaRT70.msi.
segment.target: The DaRT installation file is named MSDaRT70.msi.

segment.source: Accept the Microsoft Software License Terms, and then click Next.
segment.target: Accept the Microsoft Software License Terms, and then click Next.

segment.source: Select the destination folder for installing DaRT, select whether DaRT should be installed for all users or just the current user, and then click Next.
segment.target: Select the destination folder for installing DaRT, select whether DaRT should be installed for all users or just the current user, and then click Next.

segment.source: Select whether the installation should be Typical, Custom, or Complete, and then click Next.
segment.target: Select whether the installation should be Typical, Custom, or Complete, and then click Next.

segment.source: Typical installs the tools that are most frequently used.
segment.target: Typical installs the tools that are most frequently used.

segment.source: This method is recommended for most users.
segment.target: This method is recommended for most users.

segment.source: Custom lets you select the tools that are installed and where they will be installed.
segment.target: Custom lets you select the tools that are installed and where they will be installed.

segment.source: This is recommended for advanced users, especially if you are installing different DaRT tools on different helpdesk computers.
segment.target: This is recommended for advanced users, especially if you are installing different DaRT tools on different helpdesk computers.

segment.source: Complete installs all DaRT tools and requires the most disk space.
segment.target: Complete installs all DaRT tools and requires the most disk space.

segment.source: After you have selected your method of installation, click Next.
segment.target: After you have selected your method of installation, click Next.

segment.source: To start the installation, click Install.
segment.target: To start the installation, click Install.

segment.source: After the installation is completed successfully, click Finish to exit the wizard.
segment.target: After the installation is completed successfully, click Finish to exit the wizard.

segment.source: To install DaRT at the command prompt
segment.target: To install DaRT at the command prompt

segment.source: The following example shows how to install all DaRT functionality.
segment.target: The following example shows how to install all DaRT functionality.

segment.source: The following example shows how to install only the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard.
segment.target: The following example shows how to install only the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard.

segment.source: The following example shows how to install only the Crash Analyzer and the DaRT Remote Connection Viewer.
segment.target: The following example shows how to install only the Crash Analyzer and the DaRT Remote Connection Viewer.

segment.source: The following example creates a setup log for the Windows Installer.
segment.target: The following example creates a setup log for the Windows Installer.

segment.source: This is valuable for debugging.
segment.target: This is valuable for debugging.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You can add /qn or /qb to any of the DaRT installation command prompt options to perform a silent installation.
segment.target: You can add /qn or /qb to any of the DaRT installation command prompt options to perform a silent installation.
